item.title: About
item.dc:creator: TJ Maynes
item.description: Hi, my name is TJ Maynes and I’m a Senior Software Engineer @VMwareTanzuLabs. I’m interested in Spring/Java, Kubernetes, Go, Nix, and Cryptocurrency. Currently, I’m working more closely in the Spring Cloud ecosystem, working on passing the Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA) exam, and planning a wedding. This blog is place for me to give updates on things I’m learning, if you have questions, or concerns, feel free to message me. Also, you can find me on GitHub and LinkedIn.
item.content:encoded: Hi, my name is TJ Maynes and I’m a Senior Software Engineer @VMwareTanzuLabs. I&rsquo;m interested in Spring/Java, Kubernetes, Go, Nix, and Cryptocurrency. Currently, I&rsquo;m working more closely in the Spring Cloud ecosystem, working on passing the Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA) exam, and planning a wedding. This blog is place for me to give updates on things I&rsquo;m learning, if you have questions, or concerns, feel free to message me. Also, you can find me on GitHub and LinkedIn.
